it.welcome:
, benvenuto su amaznbot.

Click -> @amaznbot e *imposta la lingua* 
    *Esempio:* _/lang it_ 

 *Lingue disponibili:*
it.clickInstruction: Fai clik qui per le istruzioni o invia /help ad @amaznbot
it.noResultDesc: I'm sorry but there are no results, try something else
it.noResultTxt: I've searched on Amazon via @amaznbot but I couldn't find anything ‚òπÔ∏è
it.defaultLocale: US is now your default language
it.defaultLocaleTxtInline: I've set US as default locale on @amaznbot
